name: ptbas
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, ctop)), wcel(c3, ctb))

-| wceq(c3, cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(w3a(wfn(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))), wrex(s3, cfn, wral(s2, cdif(c0, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cuni(cfv(c2, cv(s2))))))), wceq(cv(s0), cixp(s2, c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))

stmt.origin: syl6eqelr(c3, ctb, cfv(cfi, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, ctop)))
stmt.pretty: syl6eqelr(c3, ctb, (fi ` c3), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → Top)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, ctop)), wcel(c3, ctb))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, ctop)), wceq(cfv(cfi, c3), c3))
-| wcel(cfv(cfi, c3), ctb)
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → Top))→ c3 ∈ TopBases)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 → Top))→(fi ` c3)= c3)
⊣ (fi ` c3)∈ TopBases
